data: “But you live like such a fool—of course you’re bored!” drawled the Older Man, rummaging listlessly through his pockets for the ever-elusive match.
"But you live like such a fool--of course you're bored!" drawled the Older Man, rummaging listlessly through his pockets for the ever-elusive match.
Abbott, Eleanor Hallowell, 1872-1958; Crosby, Raymond Moreau, 1876-1945 [Illustrator]
